caption: A wheeled robot speeds through the ruins at a tremendous pace. A massive mechanical hand grabs a white object, lifting it into the air. The white egg-shaped object is quickly retrieved inside the larger entity. The larger craft takes off into space, and the wheeled robot clings to the side of the spacecraft. The spacecraft travels over the lunar surface, past the solar surface, and through the rings of Saturn. Eventually, it arrives at a larger spaceship within the vast cosmos. The interior of the spaceship is highly technological, making the wheeled robot appear out of place. Here, the wheeled robot encounters many other white robots, and a group of robots moves continuously along what seems to be a highway-like structure.
